short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a short and clean link to the current Amazon product page, for easy sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When viewing a product on Amazon, click the button in the browser's toolbar to automatically copy a shortened link to your clipboard.  A QR code is also generated, which you can copy by right-clicking and choosing "Copy image".

Since version 1.8, this extension is designed to support all international Amazon websites.

If you find an Amazon product page where the extension is disabled or can't generate a short link, please let me know by submitting an issue on github: https://github.com/bp2008/Amazon-Product-Link-Shortener
